summary: A smexy cougar follower mod.  Let's face it what guy doesn't want a hott cougar following them around giving them gifts.  Also you can find her in the Riverwood Inn (sleeping giant inn)
descriptionHtml:
This is my second mod.  It's a sexy cougar follower that will give you gifts, and fight with you.  I used the Lisette the Bard's model and gave her some sexy Forsworn armor with some badass enchants on.  She has a purple wisp arua around her because of the enchanted ring.  Give it a try and let me know.
Side note she is marriable, and you have to have Dawnguard to use her.  Sorry forgot to add she's in the (sleeping giant inn) Riverwood
author: wowbryan76
